summary: The audit for https://movingagain.com.au/moving-interstate scored 97/100. Below is the list of issues requiring attention.

issues.remediation: Optimize your description length. Descriptions around 150-160 characters maximize screen real estate in search results without truncation.
Add article:modified_time meta tag or include dateModified in your Schema.org markup.
Strengthen your Trust Triangle by adding signals for: Security.
